sentence.Network_en: There is a ceaseless struggle from noon to night.
sentence.Network_cn: 从中午到夜晚，争斗没有停歇。

sentence.Network_en: He expected the transfer to go through by today's noon deadline.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望转账在今天中午的最后期限之前完成。

sentence.Network_en: Government workers were made to punch time clocks morning, noon and night.
sentence.Network_cn: 公务员早、中、晚都要打卡。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阳字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 指春夏〖 springandsummer〗 中午〖 noon〗 通“旸”。日出〖 comingoutofthesun〗.
... ......main titles[2-4][5]幕后花絮这是《西域威龙》的续集， 片名是为了跟“正午”（noon）相对立的“夜晚”（night），然后演变成谐音的“骑士”（knight）。故事横跨中美英三地。片中有.
心迹自然——王明明花鸟作品集... ... 清秋冷露 Cold Dew in Autumn 37 晌午 Noon 39 寒荷晴晚 Lonely Lotus in the Clear Night 41.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English nōn 'the ninth hour from sunrise, i.e. approximately 3 p.m.', from Latin nona (hora) 'ninth hour'; compare with none

encyclopedia.content: noon是泰国当红女明星，是泰国7台的当家花旦，七台三大花旦之一。有泰国第一美女，泰国版金喜善之称。

entry.def: Noon is twelve o'clock in the middle of the day.

example.ex: The long day of meetings started at noon...
example.tran: 会议接连不断的漫长一天从中午开始。

example.ex: Our branches are open from 9am to 5pm during the week and until 12 noon on Saturdays.
example.tran: 我们的分行每周一至周五上午9点到下午5点营业，周六营业到中午12点。

entry.def: Noon means happening or appearing in the middle part of the day.

example.ex: He expected the transfer to go through by today's noon deadline.
example.tran: 他希望转账在今天中午的最后期限之前完成。

auth_sentence.content: By noon, all the passengers had been released.
auth_sentence.res_content: By noon, all the passengers had been released.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By noon, all the passengers had been released.

auth_sentence.content: I was with them morning, noon and night.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was with them morning, noon and night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was with them morning, noon and night.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is scheduled to arrive at noon.
The rocket is due to lift off at noon on Friday.
sentences.cn: 火箭定于星期五中午发射。
海军陆战队在中午登陆。

sentences.en: The judge handed his decision down at noon.
The goods will be delivered at noon tomorrow.
Can you guarantee to get these before noon?
sentences.cn: 你能保证在中午之前弄到这些吗?

sentences.en: By noon, all 61 people were judged out of danger.
sentences.cn: 到中午时, 61个人看来都脱离危险了。

jushi.english: Can you guarantee to get these before noon?
jushi.chinese: 你能保证在中午之前弄到这些吗?

jushi.english: The rocket is due to lift off at noon on Friday.
jushi.chinese: 火箭定于星期五中午发射。
海军陆战队在中午登陆。
